name: Pony
actions_desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
description: This category is for small breeds of horses less than 5 feet tall at the shoulder, as described on p. 277 of Monster Manual v.3.5, as well as ponies trained for war. All items (8)
